recipesJson.name: Crack Addict Pink Lemonade
recipesJson.author: thecoffeemann
recipesJson.description: this is basically a simple summertime drink and a remix of vurve's best damn pink lemonade

reviews.text: I have been looking for a good use of my 60ml bottle of LB Pink Lemonade and I believe I found it. This is a pink lemonade with something more...crack maybe? I have been though 120 mls of this juice already and its will remain in my daily rotation for at least the remainder of the summer. Excellent recipe!!
